page.title: 11The Golf Course
page.content: The acreage of the Golf Course is 90 acres.The Golf Course is 58 years old. Before the Golf Course was made the land was used for keeping sheep and for crops.They moved two miles of hedgerow and planted 3000 trees to make the Golf Course look like it is today.The famous players and personalaties that have played there are Neil Coles,Tommy Horton, Val Doonican and Dick Woodacre.The person that has gone to top class golf is John Tozer.The membership fee that is paid every year is:Ladies Â£75 and Men Â£85.One of the ground staff said that the greens have to be cut every day,the rough once a week and the tees twice a week.The lowest score that anyone struck going round the course is ladies 76,amateur 65 and professional 67.They have 750 members.Most of the members are men.
